## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a> represents a set of symbol definitions that can be materialized as a group, or individually discarded (when overriding definitions are encountered). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### discard() {#a3e76e147441ba5fc0f7399a25d7620c4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::orc::SectCreateMaterializationUnit::discard (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbolstringptr">SymbolStringPtr</a> &amp; Name)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Implementations of this method should discard the given symbol from the source (e.g.

if the source is an LLVM IR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> and the symbol is a function, delete the function body or mark it available externally).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/sectcreate-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/sectcreate-h">SectCreate.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/sectcreate-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/sectcreate-cpp">SectCreate.cpp</a>.
